pkmkdoc.description: An OS X version of the Debian package “wdg-html-validator”.

\f0\b\fs48 \cf0 wdg-html-validator\ \pard\tx566\tx1133\tx1700\tx2267\tx2834\tx3401\tx3968\tx4535\tx5102\tx5669\tx6236\tx6803\pardirnatural
\b0\fs24 \cf0 \ \pard\tx566\tx1133\tx1700\tx2267\tx2834\tx3401\tx3968\tx4535\tx5102\tx5669\tx6236\tx6803\pardirnatural
\fs28 \cf0 This is a packaging for OS X of the Debian package of the same name.\ \ It exists because the {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "https://github.com/sebbacon/alaveteli/"}}{\fldrslt Alaveteli code}} uses it, but perhaps it will be useful for other purposes too. \ \ -- Robin Houston, 2012-02}
